reviewText: I absolutely loved the information given in the show.  We will be using the DVD's to instruct our employee's how to treat customers and really resolve pest issues using proper and safe treatment methods.  Unlike most Realty Shows this show has substance and a great cast of professionals.

It was great! I'm not sure about the other guys review. I almost didn't buy it based on his review. But for the Price you cannot go wrong. I really enjoyed the whole thing , put together nicely . Wish there was more !

This set seems to have been done as simply an advertisement for the company involved.  It was done cheaply, and much of the video footage was reused many times, at least on the first of the 4 disks, since that was as much as I could stand.  For example they showed the same wall covered with blood spots several times, plus some close-ups were reused, etc.  They only dealt with cockroaches, bedbugs, spiders and more cockroaches.  There were scant details of the actual procedures.  I got bored after the second show.  Highly not recommended.
